description: This course aims to equip students with a holistic view of risk and the management of occupational safety and health risk as part of enterprise risk management. Students will learn essential theoretical knowledge in risk analysis with a particular focus on SHE risk. Various risk analysis methodologies, from traditional event-chain approaches to more recent systemâ€™s approach will be shared. Students will also be taught on the application of analytics to better manage SHE risks. Principles and methods of data analytics will be taught, along with application examples.
title: Risk Analysis & Safety Analytics
